author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the configuration of the HLT `addOnTests` for (Run-3) collisions Data.

Up to now, these tests still had to run on Run-2 Data, using ad-hoc customisations needed to cope with the `Run3` era modifier.

This PR changes the input EDM file to one from the 2021 pilot-beam test, updates the dictionary of HLT GTs in `autoCondHLT` to use the Run-3 GTs (instead of the Run-2 ones), and removes the aforementioned ad-hoc customisations where needed. 

*Caveat* : the test for the `HIon` menu is also made to run on pilot-beam (pp) data, given the lack of HI collisions data post-Run2. The standard customisation for HI to change the name of the RAW-data input collection thus has to be disabled (it is commented out, not removed). Whenever new HI collisions data becomes available, the inputs for the relevant `HIon` tests will have to be updated accordingly, as well as the value of `run3_data_HIon` in `autoCondHLT`.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests (including `runAll.csh dev` and `addOnTests.py`).

title: update HLT `addOnTests` for Run-3 Data with 2021 pilot-beam data
